name: What's Life Visual Novel
description:
A boy named Luke tries to find his way through life, and through a seemingly odd way he enjoys searching and reflecting in the midst of the moon. Through having many choices Luke will have to decide what's really best for him.

Character Art: http://visual-novelty.devianta...

Background Art: http://visual-novelty.devianta...
